attributes.action: provide similar governmental guarantees to UK mutual societies as for banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Investors in the Presbyterian Mutual Society have found their funds frozen and the society placed in administration.  
Since most individuals affected are small investors trusting their life savings in a society previously deemed secure these should be treated as bank customers.  
Where one mutual society can fail, more may due to lack of government guarantees enjoyed by banks.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide similar governmental guarantees to UK mutual societies as for banks."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20164
